Job Title: Senior Director of Marketing

Location: Fort Lauderdale, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Brief Description

Senior Director of Marketing—ABA Centers of America

Fort Lauderdale, FL

About ABA Centers Of America

ABA Centers of America is a healthcare startup experiencing steady growth while revolutionizing the autism care field. We provide ABA (Applied Behavior Analysis) therapy and diagnostic services to our clients and families in our centers, in homes, and in the community. Our teams also support a small group of affiliated addiction treatment centers and related companies.

Our mission is to disrupt the ABA therapy field by making long waitlists for autism care and diagnosis a thing of the past. We currently operate clinics in 9 states with over 30 clinical service areas, and our roadmap will bring us to 10 states and more than 50 clinical service areas over the next 12-24 months. We have the resources and talent usually found at a more mature organization, including fully staffed teams to support marketing, IT, accounting, and clinic growth.

Leadership Opportunity 

Are you a senior level marketing leader looking for an amazing opportunity to lead, innovate, and maximize your talents the way you’ve always known you could? We need you to be our Senior Director of Marketing and lead our internal marketing services agency serving our corporate entities.

Reporting to the CMO, this pivotal role requires a strategic leader capable of managing our internal marketing services agency and driving the brand's growth through innovative marketing strategies. The successful candidate will play a crucial role in enhancing our market presence, engaging with our communities, and supporting our mission to provide outstanding autism care services.

The Senior Director of Marketing will work closely with the VP of Digital Marketing, Director of PR, and Director of Events. This position oversees Content and Communications, Creative Services (our in-house creative design/video team of 20+ located onsite and overseas), and Project Management.

This role is based 100% in-office (but it’s a FUN office), reflecting ABA Centers of America's commitment to collaborative and integrated team efforts in driving our mission forward.

Why You'll Love This Job

 Freedom to be creative and see your best ideas brought to life, given purpose, and executed professionally Work with seasoned, professional marketing teams operating smoothly within the corporate culture Enjoy a meaningful career path in a mission-driven organization dedicated to the autism community Opportunities for professional growth and leadership development within a dynamic and supportive environment Be part of a respected team that brings energy, creativity, and fun to the entire organization Our department philosophy is, “We make it happen!"


How You Will Succeed with Us

 Strategically lead the internal marketing services agency to drive brand awareness, engagement, and business growth Forge and maintain partnerships with other department leaders, continually seeking ways for Marketing to add to company projects where appropriate  Participate in meetings and initiatives related to company and clinic growth and development Lead the execution of marketing programs from start to finish, driving collaboration with the stakeholders and leveraging the right internal processes Partner with the Events team and clinic operations on event planning, resources, and creative production Oversee critical marketing functions, including market research, communications, and planning Use data-driven methods to identify changes in the competitive environment and enable responsive marketing activities Develop and implement robust marketing strategies that effectively communicate our mission, services, and impact on the autism community Analyze market trends, consumer behavior, and competitive landscape to inform strategic decisions and marketing initiatives Manage and optimize the marketing budget to ensure resources are effectively allocated to achieve maximum ROI Oversee the production of all marketing materials and communications, ensuring consistency with our brand voice and standards. Provide leadership and direction to the marketing team, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and high performance. Regularly report on marketing performance metrics, offering insights and recommendations to the executive team for continuous improvement.


Requirements

Education/Experience and Other Requirements

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field 10+ years of marketing experience, with a minimum of 5 years in a director level role with a marketing department Advertising or marketing services agency experience preferred Proven healthcare marketing experience, with a preference for candidates who have worked in the autism care or broader behavioral health sector Expert-level skills with project management tools (ClickUp, Jira, and similar platforms)  Experience with Salesforce or similar CRM platforms preferred Working knowledge of digital marketing strategies, tools, and platforms to be able to partner with VP of Digital Marketing and Digital Marketing team Bilingual (English/Spanish) a bonusMust maintain clean background/drug screenings 


Expertise Needed

 Strong analytical skills, with the ability to leverage data in making strategic marketing decisions  A sense of urgency typical of an agency environment  Ability to meet deadlines 100% of the time for factors that are controllable Exceptional leadership and team-management skills, with a track record of motivating teams to achieve high performance Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills, capable of building relationships with internal teams, external partners, and stakeholders A passion for the mission of ABA Centers of America and a commitment to making a positive impact on the lives of individuals with autism and their families


Summary

Benefits

Three weeks of paid time off in first year (more added with tenure) Medical, dental, vision, long-term disability, and life insurance Flexible Spending Account (FSA) and Health Savings Account (HSA) options Generous 401(k) with employer match up to 6%


ABA Centers of America Culture

ABA Centers of America is determined to maintain its fast-moving culture of growth and achievement. Our team of seasoned professionals works toward a shared vision of creating the nation’s leading provider of autism care. All our decisions are data-informed, mission-driven, and client-centric.

Experience Level (if available): Director
